results.title: Atenolol and fetal growth in pregnancies complicated by hypertension.
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ use may be associated with @<m>DISEASE_Growth_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006130 @@@growth retardation@@@ when given in pregnancy, although the relationship to trimester of initiation, duration of treatment, and its use as monotherapy is still uncertain.

citations.NLM: Lydakis C, Lip GY, Beevers M, Beevers DG. Atenolol and fetal growth in pregnancies complicated by hypertension. Am J Hypertens. 1999 Jun;12(6):541-7. PMID: 10371362
citations.BibTeX: @article{10371362, title={Atenolol and fetal growth in pregnancies complicated by hypertension.}, author={Lydakis C and Lip GY and Beevers M and Beevers DG}, journal={Am J Hypertens}, volume={12}, number={6}, pages={541-7}}

results.title: The use of Doppler ultrasound in the study of fetal cardiovascular physiology.
results.text_hl: The use of Doppler for these purposes is illustrated with particular reference to @<m>DISEASE_Growth_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006130 @@@intra-uterine growth retardation@@@ and the use of the antihypertensive drugs, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@.

citations.NLM: Hanretty KP, Rubin PC. The use of Doppler ultrasound in the study of fetal cardiovascular physiology. J Neurosci Methods. 1990 Sep;34(1-3):159-67. PMID: 2259237

results.title: Serious aortic complications in a patient with Turner syndrome.
results.text_hl: She was treated with @CHEMICAL_Growth_Hormone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013006 @@@growth hormone@@@ from age 16 to 18 and with @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, thyroid hormone, and estrogen.

citations.NLM: Oza NM, Siegenthaler M, Horvath K, Rosing DR, Chen MY, Arai AE, Gould HN, Bakalov V, Bondy CA. Serious aortic complications in a patient with Turner syndrome. Eur J Pediatr. 2013 May;172(5):703-5. PMID: 22923005
